nodes.text: Tales of Villainy: Follow and Lead
"Tales of Villainy: Follow and Lead" is a comic story. It was published as the secondary story of Star Wars Adventures 2 on November 25, 2020.

Above a world, Supreme Leader Kylo Ren was thinking about his new title as Supreme Leader of the First Order. When he arrived on the planet he was greeted by a First Order officer who gave him his speech. A speech was written for Ren to deliver to the people on the planet. But instead he destroyed the speech and ordered his stormtroopers forward. The people fell to their knees and bowed to their new ruler.

Shortly after on another world, Ren prepared to address the people but instead they turned on him. A woman ordered her people to attack Ren and the stormtroopers as the two groups charged at each other. As the stormtroopers fought the people, Ren chased the woman through the alleyways of the city he cut her off. She stood up to him and Ren allowed her to speak. She told him that she and her people who rather die than have to live under his fascist dictatorship. She threatened Ren but he did not take her seriously and allowed for her to live.

On his way back the officer told him that they had gained control over the people but Ren ignored him and continued to his ship. He then came to accept being Supreme Leader, whether he wanted to or not.

The story is set between Star Wars: Episode VIII The Last Jedi and Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. However, Kylo Ren is depicted wearing an unmodified version of his helmet, even though it was destroyed in The Last Jedi and The Rise of Skywalker depicts its reconstruction with a modified appearance.
